name: Web Developer

Dear Hiring Manager,

I am pleased to be applying for the Web Developer position at {{company_name:Company Name}}. My extensive experience with designing and developing websites using {{skills:Skills}} matches well with your requirements. In addition, my background with working in large development teams has given me the skills to adjust to the changing dynamics and processes of those environments while meeting scheduled milestones and deliverables.


Sincerely,

{{first:First Name}} {{last:Last Name}}
